events.message: Customer has filed a claim reporting a vehicle collision that occurred last night resulting in significant front-end damage.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following review of the initial report and damage description.
An agent specializing in auto claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and follow-up with the customer.
Acknowledgement sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps.
Requested police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a repair estimate from the claimant to proceed with assessment.
Claimant submitted the requested documents including the official police report, vehicle photos, and a detailed estimate.
Investigation has started to verify the claim details and assess liability for the vehicle collision.
Investigation completed confirming the collision circumstances and the extent of vehicle damage as stated by the claimant.
A settlement offer based on repair costs and policy terms has been proposed to the claimant.
Received positive feedback from the claimant accepting the settlement offer and expressing satisfaction with the process.
The claim has been approved following the claimant's agreement to the proposed settlement.
Payment for the approved settlement has been issued to the claimant's account as per policy guidelines.
The claim file has been officially closed after successful payment and acknowledgement from the claimant.
All claim documents and correspondence have been archived for future reference and compliance auditing.
